description.narrative:
To support citizen activism and public advocacy demanding access to protection and social integration for refugees in Croatia, Europe and globally.
The proposed project is the envisaged AYS program of activities for 2017, aiming to support citizens’ activism with regards to social integration in the context of the refugee crisis in Croatia, European Union, and globally. Since the organization is in the process of development to a more viable form of citizens initiative, AYS is applying for a core grant in order to professionalize those aspects of its work that will enable its mission and innovation sustainable. The proposed activities are combining capacity building for volunteers, alternative form of journalism, campaigning and activism, emergency aid delivery, and long term integration programs.

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity
